Community Center
----------------

![](https://static.wixstatic.com/media/b59312_fbdb0edd58584b70955e6ef7fef1e4b7~mv2.jpg/v1/fill/w_600,h_337,al_c,q_80,usm_0.66_1.00_0.01,enc_avif,quality_auto/b59312_fbdb0edd58584b70955e6ef7fef1e4b7~mv2.jpg)

The Ballinger Community Center is available for use by the public or private organizations. The building will be scheduled by reservation on a first-come basis and is secured upon paying the deposit. 

​

All reservations must be made by phone (325-365-3511) or in person at City Hall, 700 Railroad Ave.

​

Click the document below to read the Community Center's Operating Policy:
